id.description: ID of the record you are acting upon.

x-apideck-consumer-id.description: ID of the consumer which you want to get or push data from

x-apideck-app-id.description: The ID of your Unify application

x-apideck-service-id.description: Provide the service id you want to call (e.g., pipedrive). Only needed when a consumer has activated multiple integrations for a Unified API.

raw.description: Include raw response. Mostly used for debugging purposes

app_fee.description: The amount the developer is taking as a fee for facilitating the payment on behalf of the seller.
app_fee.title: App fee

approved.description: The initial amount of money approved for this payment.
approved.title: Approved amount (in cents)

amount.description: The amount of cash given by the customer.

charge_back_amount.description: The amount of change due back to the buyer. For Square: this read-only field is calculated from the amount_money and buyer_supplied_money fields.

source.description:
A description of the external payment source. For example, 
"Food Delivery Service".

source_fee_amount.description: The fees paid to the source. The amount minus this field is the net amount seller receives.
source_fee_amount.title: Source fee

source_id.description: An ID to associate the payment to its originating source.

type.description:
The type of external payment the seller received. It can be one of the following:
- CHECK - Paid using a physical check.
- BANK_TRANSFER - Paid using external bank transfer.
- OTHER\_GIFT\_CARD - Paid using a non-Square gift card.
- CRYPTO - Paid using a crypto currency.
- SQUARE_CASH - Paid using Square Cash App.
- SOCIAL - Paid using peer-to-peer payment applications.
- EXTERNAL - A third-party application gathered this payment outside of Square.
- EMONEY - Paid using an E-money provider.
- CARD - A credit or debit card that Square does not support.
- STORED_BALANCE - Use for house accounts, store credit, and so forth.
- FOOD_VOUCHER - Restaurant voucher provided by employers to employees to pay for meals
- OTHER - A type not listed here.

refunded.description: The initial amount of money approved for this payment.
refunded.title: The total amount (in cents) of the payment refunded to date.

source_id.description: The ID for the source of funds for this payment. Square-only: This can be a payment token (card nonce) generated by the payment form or a card on file made linked to the customer. if recording a payment that the seller received outside of Square, specify either `CASH` or `EXTERNAL`.

wallet.description: Wallet details for this payment. This field is currently not available. Reach out to our team for more info.

status.description: The status of the wallet payment. The status can be AUTHORIZED, CAPTURED, VOIDED, or FAILED.

wallet.title: Wallet details

PosBankAccount.description: Card details for this payment. This field is currently not available. Reach out to our team for more info.

account_ownership_type.description:
The ownership type of the bank account performing the transfer.
The type can be `INDIVIDUAL`, `COMPANY`, or `UNKNOWN`.

ach_details.description: ACH-specific details about `BANK_ACCOUNT` type payments with the `transfer_type` of `ACH`.

account_number_suffix.description: The last few digits of the bank account number.

account_type.description:
The type of the bank account performing the transfer. The account type can be `CHECKING`,
`SAVINGS`, or `UNKNOWN`.

routing_number.description: The routing number for the bank account.

bank_name.description: The name of the bank associated with the bank account.

country.description: Country code according to ISO 3166-1 alpha-2.
country.title: Country Code

fingerprint.description:
Uniquely identifies the bank account for this seller and can be used
to determine if payments are from the same bank account.

statement_description.description: The statement description as sent to the bank.

transfer_type.description: The type of the bank transfer. The type can be `ACH` or `UNKNOWN`.

PosBankAccount.title: Bank Account

bin.description: The first six digits of the card number, known as the Bank Identification Number (BIN).

card_brand.description: The first six digits of the card number, known as the Bank Identification Number (BIN).

enabled.description: Indicates whether or not a card can be used for payments.

exp_month.description: The expiration month of the associated card as an integer between 1 and 12.

exp_year.description: The four-digit year of the card's expiration date.

fingerprint.example: Intended as a POS-assigned identifier, based on the card number, to identify the card across multiple locations within a single application.

last_4.example: The last 4 digits of the card number.

reference_id.description: An optional user-defined reference ID that associates this record with another entity in an external system. For example, a customer ID from an external customer management system.
reference_id.title: Reference ID

contact_name.description: Name of the contact person at the address

country.description: country code according to ISO 3166-1 alpha-2.

county.description: Address field that holds a sublocality, such as a county

line1.description: Line 1 of the address e.g. number, street, suite, apt #, etc.

salutation.description: Salutation of the contact person at the address

string.description: The address string. Some APIs don't provide structured address data.

RowVersion.description: A binary value used to detect updates to a object and prevent data conflicts. It is incremented each time an update is made to the object.
RowVersion.title: Row version

Id.description: A unique identifier for an object.
Id.title: ID

CreatedAt.description: The date and time when the object was created.
CreatedAt.title: Created at (timestamp)

CreatedBy.description: The user who created the object.
CreatedBy.title: Created by

Currency.description: Indicates the associated currency for an amount of money. Values correspond to [ISO 4217](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217).
Currency.title: Currency

CustomMappings.description: When custom mappings are configured on the resource, the result is included here.

IdempotencyKey.description: A value you specify that uniquely identifies this request among requests you have sent.

ServiceCharges.description: Optional service charges or gratuity tip applied to the order.

percentage.description: Service charge percentage. Use this field to calculate the amount of the service charge. Pass a percentage and amount at the same time.

type.description: The type of the service charge.

UpdatedAt.description: The date and time when the object was last updated.
UpdatedAt.title: Updated at (timestamp)

UpdatedBy.description: The user who last updated the object.
UpdatedBy.title: Updated by
